questions.question: Taking place on a mysterious, moving island, this arc introduces the Mink Tribe and reveals new information about the world. What is...?
In this arc, the Straw Hat Pirates arrive at the ghostly island of Zou, home to a tribe of Minkmen and a crucial ally in their journey. What is...?
Set in the dangerous New World, this arc features the Straw Hat Pirates' alliance with the Heart Pirates to take down one of the Four Emperors. What is...?
This is the technique used by Monkey D. Luffy that allows him to drastically increase his muscle mass and size. What is...?
This ability allows its user to swim through the ground as if it were water, used notably by a member of the Shichibukai. What is...?
This ability, used by a former Warlord of the Sea, allows the manipulation of shadows. What is...?
This captain of the Kid Pirates is known for his magnetic powers and rivalry with the Straw Hat Pirates' captain. Who is...?
This former Shichibukai, known for their sand powers and role as the king of Alabasta, wields the Suna Suna no Mi. Who is...?
This character, known for their love of sweets and terrifying ability to manipulate souls, rules over Whole Cake Island. Who is...?
